query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST1109( MANDT , SPEC , SERIAL , ZZACTSS , MTART , ZSPEC1 , SPRT , SCNT , MDATE , MTIME , ERNAM , SERIAL_CH , SERIAL2 --, ZSITE_NM )
VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #SPEC# , #SERIAL3# , #ZZACTSS# , #MTART# , #ZSPEC1# , #SPRT# , #SCNT# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , #G_USER_ID# , '' , #SERIAL2# --, #ZSITE_NM# )
